Html:
Hello

I've install KiGG. It's cool :)

I've several question:

1) Is it possible to post images to story?

2) How users can add its own articles? Not links to other sites?

Hi,

Regarding your first question, KiGG doesn't support to post images (upload) to stories.

Regarding your 2nd one, KiGG is digg,dotnetkick,dzone like bookmark site. You just post link to posts/stories on other sites. So it is all about link back to real posts with just brief about them.
